Package com.highsoft.highcharts.Common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HIChartsJSONSerializable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HIColor
    This class provides color management in chart.
    HIGradient
    Definition of the gradient, similar to SVG: object literal holds start position (x1, y1) and the end position (x2, y2) relative to the shape, where 0 means top/left and 1 is bottom/right.
    HIStop
    The stops is an LinkedList of position and HIColor, position is a float between 0 and 1 assigning the relative position in the gradient, HIColor is the desired color.
